channel.title: Modules on Analogies.io
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on Analogies.io

item.title: Identifying Direction
item.description: Today we’re going to talk about the attention.

item.title: Creating Direction
item.description: This is gratitude. For our first exercise we’re going to start with gratitude. And contrary to popular belief, this exercise has almost nothing to do with being grateful. It goes much deeper than that. Before we get to that point however, what is gratitude? Well, it’s important to understand that it can be absolutely anything you want it to be. It can be a feeling.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: This is your brain. Each line represents a thought, an opinion or a judgement. Collectively, they provide us with direction. To make decisions. (i.e. dance to your favourite 90s' mixtape). -- For example, I thought it would be really cool. To create this fancy web graphic. (ommg, so pretty fancy.

item.title: Self-awareness
item.description: This is self-awareness. Self-awareness is an interface for your brain. That allows you to control your mind. This course aims to teach you to identify these configurations. As well as how to adjust them in order to create balance in our minds. The reason why it’s called self-awareness, is because you need to identify your configuration before you can change it.
